detectors.description:
YGNG.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#35-53) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- 0x192e09622028c7139815E042ae0057Df8d86a123.balance == 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#38)

YGNG.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#35-53) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#39)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#40)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#43)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#44)
detectors.markdown:
[YGNG.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#L35-L53) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#L39)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#L40)
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#L43)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#L44)

detectors.description:
YGNG.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#55-65) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#57)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#58)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#59)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- YGNG.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#21-23)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#4)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#5)
	- YGNG.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#27-29)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- YGNG.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#31-33)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#6)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#8)
	- YGNG.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#67-71)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#9)
	- YGNG.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YGNG.sol#35-53)
